alert.note: Alert for Henry (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 10:32AM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Stokes, western Rockingham and southwestern Henry Counties through 1130 AM EDT... At 1031 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Collinstown to near King. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Eden... Wentworth... Mayodan... Madison... Walnut Cove... Stoneville... and Danbury. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
